resources.string:
Hit INPUT button to refer the input given 
i.e., params passed. 
Step 1. Hit PREFETCH button. 
Step 2. Hit PROCEED button. 

Refer FAQ section for additional details.
Select Integration Type \n\nRefer FAQ section for additional details.

Hit INPUT button to refer the input given and OUTPUT button to look into Signed input. 
Step 1. Hit GENERATE CLIENT AUTH TOKEN button. 
Step 2. Hit INITIATE button. 
Step 3. Hit PROCEED button. 

Refer FAQ section for additional details.

Hit INPUT button to refer the input given and OUTPUT button to look into Signed input. 
Step 1. Hit SIGN CUSTOMER DETAILS PAYLOAD button. 
Step 2. Hit INITIATE button. 
Step 3. Hit PROCEED button. 

Refer FAQ section for additional details.

Step 1. Hit GENERATE ORDER ID button. 
Step 2. Hit CREATE ORDER button. 
Step 3. Hit PROCESS button. 
Hit INPUT button to check process input under CREATE ORDER. 
Hit INPUT button to check process input under PROCESS. 

Refer FAQ section for additional details.

Step 1. Hit GENERATE ORDER ID button. 
Step 2. Hit SIGN ORDER DETAILS PAYLOAD button. 
Step 3. Hit PROCESS button. 
Hit INPUT button to check input passed and OUTPUT button to check signed input under SIGN ORDER DETAILS PAYLOAD. 
Hit INPUT button to check process input under PROCESS. 

Refer FAQ section for additional details.
